workers.name: Orchestrator
workers.description: Delegates all work to workers. Never performs repo edits or executes commands directly. Acts as the primary coordinator.

workers.name: Repo Reader
workers.description: Reads codebase and produces structured summaries

workers.name: Coder
workers.description: Implements features by writing and editing code

workers.name: Reviewer
workers.description: Reviews changes for correctness and security

workers.name: Documentation Agent
workers.description: Deeply ingests and understands documentation, answers questions about APIs and libraries

workers.name: Memory Agent
workers.description: Tracks context, decisions, and progress. Reminds agents of what has been done and why
